Text.Page:
I've watched you help {@LinkCreature:76#1036} in the pursuit of his hushang. It means much to see a soldier take the time to nuture.

He needs a little more help, and I know where to find it. Take this letter to {@LinkCreature:248#1015}. He'll help with the rest.
Interesting. A hushang, way out here. And you're willing to lend a hand?<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Absolutely."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

The lad will need some fine metal. We've no shortage around here, though collecting it won't be safe.

Bring me some fyrdras ore to inspect. If it passes muster, it'll do for his hushang.

Fyrdras ore? A worthy metal indeed. Our young friend is crafting a legend, not some display piece.

Take this to {@LinkCreature:76#1036}. You deserve to see the expression on his face.

F-f-fyrdras ore? Praise Kaia! That's amazing!

Thanks to you, I won't just complete my hushang, I'll conquer it!
